quote_last: ,” she said, glancing at the gold watch on her pendant. “I really like ‘Auld Lang Syne.’ How about you?”
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami

quote_first: The band began playing “Auld Lang Syne.” “
quote_last: ,” she said, glancing at the gold watch on her pendant. “I really like ‘Auld Lang Syne.’ How about you?” “I prefer ‘Home on the Range.’ All those deer and antelope.” She smiled. “You must really like animals.” “I do,” I said. And I thought of my friend who likes zoos, and of his funeral suit. “I enjoyed talking to you. Goodbye.” “Goodbye,” I said.
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami
